attributes.action: GCSE: students in English Literature to take a clean copy of the novel or play.
attributes.additional_details:
I have planned this petition for a few months, this petition is not the first of it's sort and if what I ask for is not implemented it will not be the last. As a GCSE Student I know the struggles of memorising 18 poems and 3 books, quite frankly it takes away the pleasure of learning English Literature. 
I have taken my sources from:
https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/schoolsweek.co.uk/gcse-results-2017-english-literature/amp/
They will show you the drop in grades from 2016 to 2017, it's shocking.
attributes.background: As a GCSE Student I am well aware of the struggles of this new syllabus. I opine that these memory oriented exams are not testing our level of English but instead how much knowledge our brain can retain. I would much rather prefer a copy of the book be handed to us than memorising quotes.
